name: Santa is Bored
description:
Santa is Bored, so he wants to have some fun, and tries to kill his assistants.

This game was created in 46 hours by a team of 6 people, during the Creative Jam (https://www.facebook.com/events/543274815875312/). The theme was "the wind".

It recieved the first prize.

It's a 3 to 4 players game. The first one plays as the wind, and the others play as Santa's assistants. They have to stay on a cable and avoid falling in the icy water. The first player has to blow on a microphone to try to make them fall.
